email_content:
Hi Sarah,

As requested, here is the latest aggregated demographic snapshot of our active customer base to support the campaign segmentation:

Age distribution
• 25–34: 34% (strong engagement with mobile content; average CTR 4.2%)
• 35–44: 46% (highest average portfolio size; CTR 3.9%)
• 45–54: 14%
• 55+: 6%

Investment interests (top 3)
1. Real Estate (42% cite as primary)
2. Technology Start-ups (38%)
3. ESG/Sustainable Funds (26%)

Average account size
• Overall mean: USD 275K
• 25–34 segment: USD 180K
• 35–44 segment: USD 310K

Regional split (US only)
• West 30%
• Northeast 25%
• South 23%
• Midwest 22%

Engagement highlights
• Email open rate: 38% (25–34 is highest at 41%)
• Preferred channels: Mobile app push for 25–34; email and webinars for 35–44

All figures are aggregated; no individual account data is included.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Thanks,
John
